attributes.action: Change The statute limitations act now and allow victims & survivors the right to take civil action against thier abusers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please sign the petition calling for a much needed change in the statute limitations act that prevents civil action being taken by victims and survivors of child abuse and many other situations of abuse. The government has ignored the serious problems in the statute limitations act that affects so many people and protects those in the wrong and itself before it protects victims and survivors of abuse.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Change The statute limitations act now and allow victims & survivors the right to take civil action against thier abusers."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14965.asp
